title: Tooltip bug.
body:
So i just logged on to my account awhile back. Afterwards i hovered over one of my online friends and it showed me that my friend was In a Ranked Game (Which he was) and next to it the champion name (Lee Sin). So basically it looked like this.

http://imgur.com/thh7GV0

But the thing was, when i clicked 'Spectate Game', it went on to the Game loading screen and it actually showed me that his playing Kha Zix. It could be some sort of bug. This is the results what lolnexus showed up.

http://imgur.com/09nc9Np

This is not a major problem though, but still considered a bug
